synopsis.text: Death Loops, Witches of Sin, and a solemn vow - Natsuki Subaru finds himself in the midst of a daunting challenge in the second season of Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu. After a powerful speech by Otto Suwen, Subaru resolves to navigate through this timeline and save everyone he can, starting with helping Emilia confront her past. But with Emilia feeling betrayed by those around her, trusting even her self-proclaimed knight, Subaru, will be a difficult task. As Subaru delves deeper into the mysteries of the Sanctuary and its people, he encounters the seven Witches of Sin, including the Witch of Greed, Echidna, and the Witch of Jealousy, Satella. With the residents of the Sanctuary still trapped and Emilia's confrontation with her past becoming increasingly painful, Subaru must accept help from his friends to execute his plan to save Emilia and free the people of the Sanctuary. Meanwhile, Rem, Petra, and Frederica, who have stayed behind in Roswaal's mansion, find themselves in grave danger. Will Subaru be able to save everyone and make it through this timeline? Only time will tell.
